name: Lumin Creative
tag_list: software, enterprise-software, qa-software, question-and-answer, software-as-a-service, e-commerce, customer-support, online-community, forum, forum-software, tech, technology
overview:
Lumin Creative is a custom website design and development company with a solid reputation and extensive skill-set. They are focused on providing creative, scalable web solutions that reflect the needs and vision of their clients.

Lumin Creative provides a number of web-based software solutions for websites and corporations, supplying valuable tools for their online communities, intranets, and customer support systems.

Over the years, Lumin Creative has developed Lumin Answers, Lumin Support, and Lumin Synergy; but a large portion of their focus is now on Answerbase.com. Answerbase.com is an enterprise grade Q&A software that is made available to websites of any size and can be easily integrated into one’s existing website. Used by large companies such as Edmunds.com and Angie’s List, this product has proven to be a successful tool now available to everyone.
